quizDescription: Test your knowledge of musical movies with this toe-tapping trivia quiz!

questions.question: Which musical movie features a young woman named Maria who becomes a governess for the Von Trapp family?
questions.explanation: The musical movie 'The Sound of Music' features a young woman named Maria who becomes a governess for the Von Trapp family.

questions.question: In the movie 'Grease,' who plays the role of Danny Zuko?
questions.explanation: In 'Grease,' the role of Danny Zuko is played by John Travolta.

questions.question: Which musical movie follows the story of a young woman who dreams of becoming a professional ballerina?
options: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
questions.explanation: The musical movie 'Fame' follows the story of a young woman who dreams of becoming a professional ballerina.

questions.question: What is the name of the magical nanny in the movie 'Mary Poppins'?
questions.explanation: In 'Mary Poppins,' the name of the magical nanny is Mary Poppins.

questions.question: Which musical movie features a group of New York City street dancers known as the Sharks and the Jets?
questions.explanation: The musical movie 'West Side Story' features a group of New York City street dancers known as the Sharks and the Jets.

questions.question: What is the name of the fairy tale character who wishes to be 'Part of Your World' in the movie 'The Little Mermaid'?
questions.explanation: In 'The Little Mermaid,' the fairy tale character who wishes to be 'Part of Your World' is Ariel.

questions.question: Which musical movie features a young woman who moves to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a famous singer?
questions.explanation: The musical movie 'La La Land' features a young woman who moves to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a famous singer.

questions.question: In the movie 'The Greatest Showman,' who plays the role of circus impresario P.T. Barnum?
questions.explanation: In 'The Greatest Showman,' the role of circus impresario P.T. Barnum is played by Hugh Jackman.

questions.question: Which musical movie follows the story of a talented but arrogant jazz pianist and a struggling actress who fall in love in Los Angeles?
questions.explanation: The musical movie 'La La Land' follows the story of a talented but arrogant jazz pianist and a struggling actress who fall in love in Los Angeles.

questions.question: What is the name of the street-smart orphan girl who wins the heart of billionaire Oliver Warbucks in the movie 'Annie'?
questions.explanation: In the movie 'Annie,' the name of the street-smart orphan girl who wins the heart of billionaire Oliver Warbucks is Annie.

questions.question: Which musical movie tells the story of a young ballerina who gets caught up in a rivalry between two dance companies?
questions.explanation: The musical movie 'Center Stage' tells the story of a young ballerina who gets caught up in a rivalry between two dance companies.

questions.question: In the movie 'Mamma Mia!,' what is the name of the island where the story takes place?
questions.explanation: In 'Mamma Mia!,' the story takes place on the island of Kalokairi.

questions.question: Which musical movie follows the story of a young woman who dreams of becoming a star and enters a TV dance competition?
questions.explanation: The musical movie 'Flashdance' follows the story of a young woman who dreams of becoming a star and enters a TV dance competition.

questions.question: What is the name of the mischievous Genie who grants three wishes to the main character in the movie 'Aladdin'?
questions.explanation: In 'Aladdin,' the name of the mischievous Genie who grants three wishes is Genie.

questions.question: Which musical movie tells the story of a group of performers who band together to prove that 'There's No Business Like Show Business'?
questions.explanation: The musical movie 'Annie Get Your Gun' tells the story of a group of performers who band together to prove that 'There's No Business Like Show Business'.
